A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This\, in my opinion\, is the BEST movie ever made! I was nervous about it at first before I saw it. But now\, as I type this review\, I am proud of what Rian Johnson and Disney did. The Force Awakens disappointed me. This movie didn't. The plot was excellent. The action\, the dialogue\, the intensity of everything\, it was incredible!! I wish I could give this movie 6 out of 5 stars because it deserves it!!
